summary.span: 提供可用于读取和写入的受控内存缓冲区。

span.span: Provides a controlled memory buffer that can be used for reading and writing.

summary.span: 尝试访问受控缓冲区（不足和溢出）以外的内存会引发异常。

span.span: Attempts to access memory outside the controlled buffer (underruns and overruns) raise exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的任何实例之前，必须先调用方法 。You must call the method before you use any instance of . 若要避免在静态变量中存储对象的实例时进行争用 ，应使用以下方法之一：To avoid races when you store an instance of a object in a static variable, you should use one of the following approaches: - 在发布时创建一个锁 。Create a lock when publishing the . - 创建一个局部变量，初始化 ，然后将分配 给静态变量，例如，通过使用 方法。Create a local variable, initialize the , and then assign the to the static variable, for example, by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 静态类构造函数中的赋值被隐式锁定。Assignments in a static class constructor are implicitly locked.
